poem:
**Weather Report**

In the barracks of the sun,  
battle lines are drawn in soil,  
clouds dispatch their units—  
a slow march across green territories.  
Generals measure growth in shadows cast,  
gauge footsteps in melted ice,  
as the thin thread of barometers  
stitches wind to water,  
muttering strategies on breathless radios  
in this campaign for tomorrow.
